titles: A treatise, concerning the causes of the magnificencie and greatnes of cities, deuided into three bookes by Sig: Giouanni Botero, in the Italian tongue; now done into English by Robert Peterson, of Lincolnes Inne Gent. Seene and allowed
Delle cause della grandezza delle città. English
author: Botero, Giovanni, 1540-1617.
Peterson, Robert, fl. 1576-1606.
publisher: Printed by T. P[urfoot] for Richard Ockould, and Henry Tomes, and are to be sold, at Grayes Inne gate in Holborne,
notes: Translation of: Delle cause della grandezza delle cittá.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Cities and towns --  Early works to 1800.
